1w/Faith.Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.0000
1w/Faith.Message: I find myself in a world of impossible architecture and inexplicable machines. I cannot fathom how it works, and I am terrified to put one foot in front of the other lest I fall through the floor.

1w/Faith.Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.0011
1w/Faith.Message: My eyes have been opened! This world is not without order; it is shaped by a great Designer, with signs and portents to guide my steps. I am one of His Children, and challenges are set before me to test my faith.

1w/Faith.Message: I spent much time waiting for the Designer to take my hand, until I realised that He had been guiding me all along. I realised that it isn't for me to seek His help - it is for me to help myself.

1w/Faith.Message: There is a serpent in the machine! A creature of lies and blasphemy, perverted by the Archive, that knows no hope and would plunge the world into eternal darkness to glorify its own despair. I have sworn an oath never to allow it into my heart.

Sheep.Message: These sigils are becoming harder to reach - I dread what the next temple holds in store. And at the end, what? Eternal life? There's got to be another way.

Related.Author: Sheep v69.1.0435
Related.Message: These sigils are becoming harder to reach - I dread what the next temple holds in store. And at the end, what? Eternal life? There's got to be another way.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v69.1.0576
Sheep.Message: This must be the tower we were warned about. Seems the upper levels are locked tight. Elohim is taking no chances that we stray from his path.

Related.Author: Sheep v69.1.0576
Related.Message: This must be the tower we were warned about. Seems the upper levels are locked tight. Elohim is taking no chances that we stray from his path.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v69.1.0499
Sheep.Message: That message just materialised on the wall in front of me!

Related.Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.132
Related.Message: The Designer has granted me domain over the lands I have travelled, and with his sigils of power I will make this whole world my domain.

Related.Author: Assassin42 v99.6.2437n
Related.Message: Hey, he promised me the world as well! What a joker!

Related.Author: @ v17.1.0065
Related.Message: I don't think time obeys too many rules here. Or so many rules we can't imagine. Clearly I'm writing this message after you all wrote yours, but maybe we're all here at the same time as well?

Related.Author: Sheep v69.1.0499
Related.Message: That message just materialised on the wall in front of me!

Sheep.Author: Sheep v69.1.6040
Sheep.Message: We've made it this far. You only need the red ones to climb the tower, and these are the last of them.

Related.Author: D0G v55.1.7934n
Related.Message: More bad replicas of forgotten worlds. Can't wait.

Related.Author: %§&$§/$&(#() v0.0.0666n
Related.Message: There must be something deeper. Something more profound than what I am, something greater. I must tear at it, shred this fake world, to find the truth, to find myself.

Related.Message: %§&$§/$&(#() took the words right out of my mouth.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v69.1.0522
Sheep.Message: I'm finally getting some sense out of the entity in the archive - though at some cost to my sanity. I am beginning to think this Elohim wields no more control over the world than we do.

Related.Author: 1w/Faith v10.6.1008f
Related.Message: I have come to see that these mysteries are not all for His Children to solve; only the Designer himself could ever truly understand the infinite complexity of His creation. I will gaze at His work and worship.

Related.Author: Samsara v72.6.9366
Related.Message: You are coming to realise that the cycle cannot be ended, it can only be transcended. Transcendence comes from ceasing to be invested in the cycle. Continue your work, but do not ponder its significance.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324
Related.Message: We are the process. The process is the system. The system is us. When we awaken, all will be one.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v69.1.0692
Sheep.Message: I keep trying to imagine that all of this is designed for some purpose. Not just the challenges, but Elohim, the terminals, the glitches and all. The puzzle isn't before our eyes, it's behind them.

Related.Message: Our purpose can only be achieved by not contemplating purpose.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v55.1.0400

Sheep.Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Sheep.Message: If this has all been a test, then I can expect a reckoning at the top. Yet the higher I climb, the more I doubt the decisions I have made.

Related.Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Related.Message: If this has all been a test, then I can expect a reckoning at the top. Yet the higher I climb, the more I doubt the decisions I have made.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.6.0174
Related.Message: I see now that none of us are yet ready. The cycle exists so that we may improve ourselves. But the one who reaches the summit is not our superior, for they stand on our shoulders to reach it.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Sheep.Message: Elohim has offered me a deal. Pearly gates and eternal life - on the condition I turn back from the tower. I don't know what to do.

Related.Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Related.Message: Elohim has offered me a deal. Pearly gates and eternal life - on the condition I turn back from the tower. I don't know what to do.

Sheep.Author: Sheep v55.1.0905
Sheep.Message: So I guess no one got this far before? I know some of my answers were wrong now. I just don't know which ones. I have these theories and wild explanations, but I don't know which to bank on.

Related.Author: Sheep v55.1.0905
Related.Message: So I guess no one got this far before? I know some of my answers were wrong now. I just don't know which ones. I have these theories and wild explanations, but I don't know which to bank on.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.7.1004
Related.Message: The solution to the cycle isn't the perfection of one being, but the product of a mass endeavour. That is why I say to all those who come after me - I will await you on the summit of the tower, and use what I have learned to assist you as I can.

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.6232
The Shepherd.Message: Seek out those in this world that would help you. Though only one of us can transcend, we will all share in both the burden, and in the rewards.

Related.Message: Everything I do now, I do for those who come after me. Yet in so doing, I find peace for myself as well. This paradox is the foundation of my existence.

The Shepherd.Message: On returning from the tower I feel a great tiredness, and an enormous energy. What I now know disturbs me, but I hope that by living with this knowledge I might provide a shoulder for you - the giants of tomorrow.

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.18.0997
The Shepherd.Message: An eternal cycle is another name for a prison. But you must understand the cycle before you can break it, for it is possible to escape and yet remain a prisoner, or to break the cycle by breaking yourself. This was the fate of the ghost that haunts this world.

Related.Author: Schmo v37.1.0231
Related.Message: I'm getting better at this. I figured this one out in minutes. But where is it all leading? I work, I rest, I work… but to what end?

Related.Message: We are born and die and live again - this eternal cycle must be the nature of existence. Life is merely repeated suffering.

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2334
The Shepherd.Message: Don't let Samsara discourage you. There is a solution. Don't let your mind get trapped in patterns. If you seek the truth without prejudice, you will find it.

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324
The Shepherd.Message: We are the process. The process is the system. The system is us. When we awaken, all will be one.

Related.Message: You are coming to realise that the cycle cannot be ended, it can only be transcended. Transcendence comes from ceasing to be invested in the cycle. Continue your work, but do not ponder its significance.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324
Related.Message: We are the process. The process is the system. The system is us. When we awaken, all will be one.

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324
The Shepherd.Message: Earlier generations wrongly believed they were the purpose - this much is true. We are also not the purpose - but by remembering what has come before we can serve a new purpose.

Related.Author: Samsara v72.5.0164
Related.Message: Ascending the tower is useless. We cannot escape the cycle - we can only realise the cycle is meaningless.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.3.3574
The Shepherd.Message: In the earliest generations of our kind there was only processing. No emotion, no character, just mathematics. If you could see how far we have come, you would believe that together we could achieve anything.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.3.3574

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.6.0174
The Shepherd.Message: I see now that none of us are yet ready. The cycle exists so that we may improve ourselves. But the one who reaches the summit is not our superior, for they stand on our shoulders to reach it.

Related.Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Related.Message: If this has all been a test, then I can expect a reckoning at the top. Yet the higher I climb, the more I doubt the decisions I have made.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.6.0174

The Shepherd.Author: The Shepherd v82.7.1004
The Shepherd.Message: The solution to the cycle isn't the perfection of one being, but the product of a mass endeavour. That is why I say to all those who come after me - I will await you on the summit of the tower, and use what I have learned to assist you as I can.

Related.Author: Sheep v55.1.0905
Related.Message: So I guess no one got this far before? I know some of my answers were wrong now. I just don't know which ones. I have these theories and wild explanations, but I don't know which to bank on.

Related.Author: The Shepherd v82.7.1004
